hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.name: CUSTOM_ENV_TEMPLATE
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.description: View existing templates at sjones4/eucalyptus-extras on github

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CLOUD_OPTS
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: e.g. --debug -Xmx2g Use EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_CLOUD_OPTS for global options

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: EUCALYPTUS_YUM_REPO_VERSION
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Specify the default yum repository by version. Will use EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_EUCALYPTUS_YUM_REPO for 4.4.2 EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_EUCALYPTUS_YUM_REPO_DEV for 4.4.x

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: EUCALYPTUS_YUM_REPO
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Defaults to global setting for version if any, else http://downloads.eucalyptus.com/software/eucalyptus/4.4/rhel/7/x86_64/

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: EUCA2OOLS_YUM_REPO
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Defaults to EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_EUCA2OOLS_YUM_REPO if set, else http://downloads.eucalyptus.com/software/euca2ools/3.4/rhel/7/x86_64/

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: EUCALYPTUS_DNS_DOMAIN
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Defaults to EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_EUCALYPTUS_DNS_DOMAIN if set, else ETP_HOST0_IP.nip.io

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: NET_PUBLIC_IP_RANGE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Defaults to public ip ranges for reserved hosts

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: NET_PRIVATE_IP_RANGE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Defaults to private ip ranges for reserved hosts

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: NODE_MAX_CORES
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Defaults to EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_NODE_MAX_CORES if set, else 0 for available cores on each node

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CLUSTER_MAX_INSTANCES
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Defaults to EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_CLUSTER_MAX_INSTANCES if set, else 128

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: CLUSTER_SCHEDULING_POLICY
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Defaults to EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_CLUSTER_SCHEDULING_POLICY if set, else ROUNDROBIN

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: HOST_PARAM_CPU
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Minimum core requirement for candidate hosts

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: RELEASE_RESERVATION
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Release host reservation on successful build/test

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: QA_TESTS
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Run N4J short test suite post deploy

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
if [ "true" = "${EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_DOCKER_PULLS:-true}" ] ; then echo "Pulling latest calyptos docker image" docker pull sjones4/calyptos:4.4 fi
echo "Extracting resource requirements from environment template" [ ! -d env ] || rm -rf env mkdir -v env mv -v template_aliases.yaml env/
TEMPLATE_PATH="/calyptos/templates/${ENV_TEMPLATE}-environment.yaml" if [ "${ENV_TEMPLATE}" = "CUSTOM_ENV_TEMPLATE" ] ; then TEMPLATE_PATH="/env/template-environment.yaml" echo "${CUSTOM_ENV_TEMPLATE}" > "env/template-environment.yaml" fi
ENV_HOST_COUNT=$(docker run \ ${EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_DOCKER_RUN_OPTS} \ --rm \ -v $(pwd)/env:/env \ sjones4/calyptos:4.4 \ template-info.sh "${TEMPLATE_PATH}" "host-count")
echo "HOST_COUNT=${ENV_HOST_COUNT}" > env/reservation.properties echo "HOST_PARAM_CPU=${HOST_PARAM_CPU}" >> env/reservation.properties echo "HOST_PARAM_MEM=${HOST_PARAM_MEM}" >> env/reservation.properties echo "Reserving hosts using properties" cat env/reservation.properties

# ssh key setup SSH_KEY_DIR=$(mktemp -dt ssh.XXXXXXXX) SSH_KEY_FILE="${SSH_KEY_DIR}/id_rsa" SSH_KNOWNHOSTS="${SSH_KEY_DIR}/known_hosts" function cleanup { echo "Performing cleanup" [ ! -d "${SSH_KEY_DIR}" ] || rm -rf "${SSH_KEY_DIR}" } trap cleanup EXIT echo "-----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY-----" > "${SSH_KEY_FILE}" echo ${EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_SSH_KEY} | sed "s/ /\n/g" >> "${SSH_KEY_FILE}" echo "-----END RSA PRIVATE KEY-----" >> "${SSH_KEY_FILE}" chmod 600 "${SSH_KEY_FILE}" ssh-keygen -y -f "${SSH_KEY_FILE}" > "${SSH_KEY_DIR}/id_rsa.pub"
echo "Stashing host reservations" [ ! -d reservations ] || rm -rf reservations for HOST in $(<env/reserved_hosts.txt); do mkdir -vp reservations/${HOST} scp -Bpri "${SSH_KEY_FILE}" -o BatchMode=yes -o UserKnownHostsFile="${SSH_KNOWNHOSTS}" -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@${HOST}:.reservation reservations/${HOST} done find reservations -type f
# pick eucalyptus yum repository for specified version or custom if [ "${EUCALYPTUS_YUM_REPO_VERSION}" == "4.4.x" ] ; then ETP_EUCALYPTUS_YUM_REPO="${EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_EUCALYPTUS_YUM_REPO_DEV:-${EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_EUCALYPTUS_YUM_REPO}}" elif [ "${EUCALYPTUS_YUM_REPO_VERSION}" == "4.4.2" ] ; then ETP_EUCALYPTUS_YUM_REPO="${EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_EUCALYPTUS_YUM_REPO}" else ETP_EUCALYPTUS_YUM_REPO="${EUCALYPTUS_YUM_REPO:-${EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_EUCALYPTUS_YUM_REPO_DEV:-${EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_EUCALYPTUS_YUM_REPO}}}" fi
ENV_TEMPLATE_VARS_FILE="env/template_variables.txt" echo "Building environment template variables file ${ENV_TEMPLATE_VARS_FILE}" echo "# Environment template variables for ${BUILD_ID}" >> "${ENV_TEMPLATE_VARS_FILE}" echo "ETP_CEPH_POOL_SNAPSHOTS=${EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_CEPH_POOL_SNAPSHOTS:-eucasnapshots}" >> "${ENV_TEMPLATE_VARS_FILE}" echo "ETP_CEPH_POOL_VOLUMES=${EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_CEPH_POOL_VOLUMES:-eucavolumes}" >> "${ENV_TEMPLATE_VARS_FILE}" echo "ETP_CEPH_RBD_KEY=${EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_CEPH_RBD_KEY}" >> "${ENV_TEMPLATE_VARS_FILE}" echo "ETP_CEPH_S3_ACCESS_KEY=${EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_CEPH_S3_ACCESS_KEY}" >> "${ENV_TEMPLATE_VARS_FILE}" echo "ETP_CEPH_S3_ENDPOINT=${EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_CEPH_S3_ENDPOINT:-127.0.0.1:7480}" >> "${ENV_TEMPLATE_VARS_FILE}" echo "ETP_CEPH_S3_SECRET_KEY=${EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_CEPH_S3_SECRET_KEY}" >> "${ENV_TEMPLATE_VARS_FILE}" echo "ETP_CLUSTER_MAX_INSTANCES=${CLUSTER_MAX_INSTANCES:-${EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_CLUSTER_MAX_INSTANCES:-128}}" >> "${ENV_TEMPLATE_VARS_FILE}" echo "ETP_CLUSTER_SCHEDULING_POLICY=${CLUSTER_SCHEDULING_POLICY:-${EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_CLUSTER_SCHEDULING_POLICY:-ROUNDROBIN}}" >> "${ENV_TEMPLATE_VARS_FILE}" echo "ETP_DAS_DEVICE=${EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_DAS_DEVICE:-storage_vg}" >> "${ENV_TEMPLATE_VARS_FILE}" echo "ETP_DNS_SERVER=${DNS_SERVER:-${EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_DNS_SERVER}}" >> "${ENV_TEMPLATE_VARS_FILE}" echo "ETP_EUCA2OOLS_YUM_REPO=${EUCA2OOLS_YUM_REPO:-${EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_EUCA2OOLS_YUM_REPO}}" >> "${ENV_TEMPLATE_VARS_FILE}" echo "ETP_EUCALYPTUS_BRANCH=${EUCALYPTUS_GIT_BRANCH}" >> "${ENV_TEMPLATE_VARS_FILE}" echo "ETP_EUCALYPTUS_CLOUD_LIBS_BRANCH=${CLOUD_LIBS_GIT_BRANCH}" >> "${ENV_TEMPLATE_VARS_FILE}" echo "ETP_EUCALYPTUS_CLOUD_LIBS_GIT_REPO=${CLOUD_LIBS_GIT_REPO}" >> "${ENV_TEMPLATE_VARS_FILE}" echo "ETP_EUCALYPTUS_CLOUD_OPTS=${EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_CLOUD_OPTS} ${CLOUD_OPTS}" >> "${ENV_TEMPLATE_VARS_FILE}" echo "ETP_EUCALYPTUS_DNS_DOMAIN=${EUCALYPTUS_DNS_DOMAIN:-${EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_EUCALYPTUS_DNS_DOMAIN:-ETP_HOST0_IP.nip.io}}" >> "${ENV_TEMPLATE_VARS_FILE}" echo "ETP_EUCALYPTUS_GIT_REPO=${EUCALYPTUS_GIT_REPO}" >> "${ENV_TEMPLATE_VARS_FILE}" echo "ETP_EUCALYPTUS_YUM_REPO=${ETP_EUCALYPTUS_YUM_REPO}" >> "${ENV_TEMPLATE_VARS_FILE}" echo "ETP_GATEWAY=${NET_GATEWAY:-${EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_NET_GATEWAY}}" >> "${ENV_TEMPLATE_VARS_FILE}" echo "ETP_INSTALL_TYPE=${INSTALL_TYPE}" >> "${ENV_TEMPLATE_VARS_FILE}" echo "ETP_NETMASK=${NET_NETMASK:-${EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_NET_NETMASK}}" >> "${ENV_TEMPLATE_VARS_FILE}" echo "ETP_NODE_CACHE_SIZE=${EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_NODE_CACHE_SIZE:--1}" >> "${ENV_TEMPLATE_VARS_FILE}" echo "ETP_NODE_MAX_CORES=${NODE_MAX_CORES:-${EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_NODE_MAX_CORES:-0}}" >> "${ENV_TEMPLATE_VARS_FILE}" echo "ETP_NODE_NIC=${EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_NODE_NIC:-eno1}" >> "${ENV_TEMPLATE_VARS_FILE}" echo "ETP_NODE_WORK_SIZE=${EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_NODE_WORK_SIZE:--1}" >> "${ENV_TEMPLATE_VARS_FILE}" echo "ETP_NTP_SERVER=${NTP_SERVER:-${EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_NTP_SERVER}}" >> "${ENV_TEMPLATE_VARS_FILE}" echo "ETP_PRIVATE_IP_RANGE=${NET_PRIVATE_IP_RANGE}" >> "${ENV_TEMPLATE_VARS_FILE}" echo "ETP_PUBLIC_IP_RANGE=${NET_PUBLIC_IP_RANGE}" >> "${ENV_TEMPLATE_VARS_FILE}" echo "ETP_SUBNET=${NET_SUBNET:-${EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_NET_SUBNET}}" >> "${ENV_TEMPLATE_VARS_FILE}" cat --number "${ENV_TEMPLATE_VARS_FILE}"
echo "Generating environment" TEMPLATE_PATH="/calyptos/templates/${ENV_TEMPLATE}-environment.yaml" if [ "${ENV_TEMPLATE}" = "CUSTOM_ENV_TEMPLATE" ] ; then TEMPLATE_PATH="/env/template-environment.yaml" fi TEMPLATE_ALIAS_PATH="/env/template_aliases.yaml" docker run \ ${EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_DOCKER_RUN_OPTS} \ --rm \ --env-file "${ENV_TEMPLATE_VARS_FILE}" \ -v "${SSH_KEY_DIR}":/root/.ssh \ -v $(pwd)/env:/env \ sjones4/calyptos:4.4 \ template-env.sh \ "${TEMPLATE_PATH}" \ "${TEMPLATE_ALIAS_PATH}" \ "/env/reserved_hosts.txt" \ "/env/reserved_host_names.txt" \ "/env/reserved_public_ip_ranges.txt" \ "/env/reserved_private_ip_ranges.txt" \ > env/environment.yaml
echo "Using environment" cat --number env/environment.yaml
for HOST in $(<env/reserved_hosts.txt); do echo "Koaning CentOS 7 on ${HOST}" ssh -i "${SSH_KEY_FILE}" -o BatchMode=yes -o UserKnownHostsFile="${SSH_KNOWNHOSTS}" -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@${HOST} "yum -y install epel-release; yum -y install koan && koan --server=${EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_COBBLER_SERVER} --system=\$(hostname | cut -d '.' -f 1) --replace-self && { nohup shutdown -r +1 & }" done
echo "Sleeping 120 to allow CentOS 7 install to start" sleep 120
echo "Waiting for hosts to become available" docker run \ ${EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_DOCKER_RUN_OPTS} \ --rm \ -v "${SSH_KEY_DIR}":/root/.ssh \ -v $(pwd)/env:/env \ sjones4/calyptos:4.4 host-wait.sh $(<env/reserved_hosts.txt)
for HOST in $(<env/reserved_hosts.txt); do echo "Restoring host reservation ${HOST}" scp -Bpri "${SSH_KEY_FILE}" -o BatchMode=yes -o UserKnownHostsFile="${SSH_KNOWNHOSTS}" -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no reservations/${HOST}/.reservation root@${HOST}: done
echo "Sleeping 60 to allow CentOS 7 install to complete" sleep 60
echo "Running calyptos" docker run \ ${EUCALYPTUS_GLOBAL_DOCKER_RUN_OPTS} \ --rm \ -v "${SSH_KEY_DIR}":/root/.ssh \ -v $(pwd)/env:/env \ sjones4/calyptos:4.4 calyptos -e /env/environment.yaml
for HOST in $(<env/reserved_hosts.txt); do echo "Rebooting ${HOST}" ssh -i "${SSH_KEY_FILE}" -o BatchMode=yes -o UserKnownHostsFile="${SSH_KNOWNHOSTS}" -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@${HOST} reboot || true done
echo "Build steps completed, run n4j tests: ${QA_TESTS}, release reservation: ${RELEASE_RESERVATION}"
[ ! -d tasks ] || rm -rf tasks if [ "${RELEASE_RESERVATION}" = "true" ] || [ "${QA_TESTS}" = "true" ]; then mkdir -v tasks
if [ "${QA_TESTS}" = "true" ] ; then echo "Sleeping 90 seconds to allow reboot to progress before testing" sleep 90
for HOST in $(<env/reserved_hosts.txt); do echo "CLC_IP=${HOST}" > tasks/qa.properties echo "Running QA tests using properties" cat tasks/qa.properties break done fi
if [ "${RELEASE_RESERVATION}" = "true" ] ; then echo "RESERVATION_ID=$(<env/reservation_id.txt)" > tasks/host_release.properties echo "Releasing hosts using properties" cat tasks/host_release.properties fi fi
